entry.title: Sunday: Periods of drizzle. Temperature steady near zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of drizzle changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle this afternoon. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this morning then becoming northwest 20 this afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 7 May 2023
